name: Assigned Bread
description:
KO!! Slam-Jam game jam

This was a 72 hour game jam that had a total of three themes to pick from: https://itch.io/jam/ko-slam-jam. With some suggested from the following: (artistic) Slam, (zing) 120 Seconds, and (optimistic) Transition. 

What is it?

A short visual novel inspired allegory based on the optimistic Transition theme. The whole game is text, so if you don't like reading lots of dialogue then you won't enjoy this!
